title: Vinnie Bharara & Marc Lore, Co-Founders Of Diapers.Com
teaser: Host Jessica Harris talks with Vinnie Bharara and Marc Lore, co-founders of Diapers.com, an online retail site specializing in baby products. Harris also talks with Sam Goldman, founder of d.light.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris talks with Vinnie Bharara and Marc Lore, co-founders of Diapers.com, an online retail site specializing in baby products. Harris also talks with Sam Goldman, founder of d.light.
